theOtherBoys.title: The Other Guys
theOtherBoys.body: Two mismatched New York City detectives seize an opportunity to step up like the city's top cops, whom they idolize, only things don't quite go as planned.

badBoys.title: Bad Boys
badBoys.body: Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct.

unbroken.title: Unbroken
unbroken.body: After a near-fatal plane crash in wwii, Olympian Louis Zamperini spends a harrowing 47 days in a raft with two fellow crewmen before he's caught.

kingsMan.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
kingsMan.body: A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency's training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.

robinHood.title: Robin Hood
robinHood.body: A war-hardened Crusader and his Moorish commander mount an audacious revolt against the corrupt English crown.

jumanji.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
jumanji.body: In Jumanji: The Next Level, the gang is back but the game has changed. As they return to rescue one of their own.

spenser confidential.title: Spenser Confidential
spenser confidential.body: When two Boston police officers are murdered, ex-cop Spenser teams up with his no-nonsense roommate, Hawk, to take down criminals.

the dictator.title: The Dictator
the dictator.body: The heroic story of a dictator who risked his life to ensure that democracy would never come to the country he so lovingly oppressed.

year one.title: Year One
year one.body: After being banished from their tribe, two hunter-gatherers encounter Biblical characters and eventually wind up in the city of Sodom.

theRidiculous6.title: The Ridiculous 6
theRidiculous6.body: An outlaw who was raised by Native Americans discovers that he has five half-brothers; together the men go on a mission to find their wayward, deadbeat dad.

ladies in black.title: Ladies in Black
ladies in black.body: Adapted from the bestselling novel by Madeleine St John, Ladies in Black is an alluring and tender-hearted comedy drama.

superbad.title: Superbad
superbad.body: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.

darknest hour.title: Darkest Hour
darknest hour.body: In May 1940, the fate of World War II hangs on Winston Churchill, who must decide whether to negotiate with Adolf Hitler, or fight on knowing.

fury.title: Fury
fury.body: A grizzled tank commander makes tough decisions as he and his crew fight their way across Germany in April, 1945.

defiance.title: Defiance
defiance.body: Jewish brothers in Nazi-occupied Eastern Europe escape into the Belarussian forests, where they join Russian resistance fighters.

the theory of everything.title: The Theory of Everything
the theory of everything.body: A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.

12 years a slave.title: 12 Years a Slave
12 years a slave.body: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

the pianist.title: The Pianist
the pianist.body: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

contagion.title: Contagion
contagion.body: Healthcare professionals, government officials and everyday people find themselves in the midst of a pandemic as the CDC works to find a cure.

angelsAndDemons.title: Angels And Demons
angelsAndDemons.body: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon works with a nuclear physicist to solve a murder and prevent a terrorist act against the Vatican.

lawAbidingCitizen.title: Law Abiding Citizen
lawAbidingCitizen.body: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free.

prisoners.title: Prisoners
prisoners.body: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

thePlatform.title: The Platform
thePlatform.body: A vertical prison with one cell per level. Two people per cell. One only food platform and two minutes per day to feed from up to down. An endless nightmare trapped in The Hole.

redDragon.title: Red Dragon
redDragon.body: A retired FBI agent with psychological gifts is assigned to help track down The Tooth Fairy, a mysterious serial killer.

code8.title: Code 8
code8.body: A super-powered construction worker falls in with a group of criminals in order to raise the funds to help his ill mother.

hellboy.title: Hell Boy
hellboy.body: Based on the graphic novels by Mike Mignola, Hellboy, caught between the worlds of the supernatural and human, battles an ancient sorceress bent on revenge.

clasOfTheTitans.title: Clash of the Titans
clasOfTheTitans.body: Perseus demigod, son of Zeus, battles the minions of the underworld to stop them from conquering heaven and earth.

theLastWitchHunter.title: The Last Witch Hunter
theLastWitchHunter.body: The last witch hunter is all that stands between humanity and the combined forces of the most horrifying witches in history.

draculaUntold.title: Dracula Untold
draculaUntold.body: As his kingdom is being threatened by the Turks, young prince Vlad Tepes must become a monster feared by his own people.

theMazeRunner.title: The Maze Runner
theMazeRunner.body: Thomas is deposited in a community of boys after his memory is erased, soon learning they're all trapped in a maze that will require him to join forces with fellow runners for a shot at escape.

dirrtyGrandpa.title: Dirty Grandpa
dirrtyGrandpa.body: Right before his wedding, an uptight guy is tricked into driving his grandfather, a lecherous former Army Lieutenant Colonel, to Florida for Spring Break.

nationalSecurity.title: National Security
nationalSecurity.body: Two mismatched security guards are thrown together to bust a smuggling operation.

yesMan.title: Yes Man
yesMan.body: A man challenges himself to say yes to everything for an entire year.

thatsMyBoy.title: That's My Boy
thatsMyBoy.body: While in his teens, Donny fathered a son, Todd, and raised him as a single parent until Todd's 18th birthday. Now Donny resurfaces just before Todd's wedding.

dueDate.title: Due Date
dueDate.body: High-strung father-to-be Peter Highman is forced to hitch a ride with aspiring actor Ethan Tremblay on a road trip in order to make it to his child's birth on time.

theInterview.title: The Interview
theInterview.body: Dave Skylark and his producer Aaron Rapaport run the celebrity tabloid show Skylark Tonight. When they land an interview with a surprise fan.

3096Days.title: 3096 Days
3096Days.body: A young Austrian girl is kidnapped and held in captivity for eight years. Based on the factual case of Natascha Kampusch.

theImpossible.title: The Impossible
theImpossible.body: The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

theStepfather.title: The Stepfather
theStepfather.body: Michael Harding (Penn Badgely) returns home from military school to find his mother Susan (Sela Ward) happily in love and living with her new boyfriend.

aWalkAmongTheTombstones.title: A Walk Among the Tombstones
aWalkAmongTheTombstones.body: Private investigator Matthew Scudder is hired by a drug kingpin to find out who kidnapped and murdered his wife.

marriageStory.title: Marriage Story
marriageStory.body: Noah Baumbach's incisive and compassionate look at a marriage breaking up and a family staying together.

theFrozenGround.title: The Frozen Ground
theFrozenGround.body: An Alaska State Trooper partners with a young woman who escaped the clutches of serial killer Robert Hansen to bring the murderer to justice. Based on actual events.

awake.title: Awake
awake.body: A man wakes in a hospital bed with no recollection of who he is, and learns that he's wanted by the police for committing a series of murders.

theProdigy.title: The Prodigy
theProdigy.body: A mother concerned about her young son's disturbing behavior thinks something supernatural may be affecting him.

hush.title: Hush
hush.body: A deaf and mute writer who retreated into the woods to live a solitary life must fight for her life in silence when a masked killer appears at her window.

whatKeepsYouAlive.title: What Keeps You Alive
whatKeepsYouAlive.body: Majestic mountains, a still lake and venomous betrayals engulf a female married couple attempting to celebrate their one-year anniversary.

shutterIsland.title: Shutter Island
shutterIsland.body: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

deliverUsfromEvil.title: Deliver Us from Evil
deliverUsfromEvil.body: New York police officer Ralph Sarchie investigates a series of crimes. He joins forces with an unconventional priest.
